Categorize this IT Ticket:

needs approval for expenses invoice sent tuesday december needs approval for invoice hi could you please raise ticket for below best regards applications analyst en sent monday december re needs approval for invoice thank you hi please below seems be awaiting some approvals what but whether can find approve needed please advise next steps thank you sent monday december re needs approval for invoice hi have done search requested but find anything regards sent december needs approval for invoice hello appears have gone through properly for approval for october past due would appreciate if could be approved please detailed steps by below summary for steps tools search by thank you regards sent tuesday december re needs approval for invoice done sent tuesday december re needs approval for invoice hi could you please reproduce steps below let know if you requested there kind regards applications analyst en date monday december re needs approval for invoice hello could you please try following go choose tab search by number open task appear approve when person needs approve something expense report card there task generated by assigned person assigned means person needs accomplish task she should you need any further assistance please hesitate contact best regards have sent december re needs approval for invoice thanks sorry know hi approve but showing up his end would appreciate your help with if we have reach out please let know please attached sent also below showing assigned him what does assigned mean confused thank you sent friday december re needs approval for invoice hi checked does show up for any ideas where can access approve thank you senior manager date friday december needs approval for invoice hi module shows number pending with you for approval would appreciate if you could approve can go next need approve thank you senior accountant

**Finalizing the Classification**

I've zeroed in on the "Purchase" category. The text consistently highlights expense approvals and invoice management. This aligns directly with purchasing, procurement, or related financial processes within the IT domain. "Purchase" best captures the essence of the ticket's core function.
